DialogueOption.Text: You look like you have something to ask me, Galena.
Slate says that the Little Scout just uses hooks to stick onto stuff.
You still look like you have something to ask me, Galena.
What did you want me to ask Slate again, Galena?
Slate says that the Little Scout just uses hooks to stick onto stuff.
You still look like you have something to ask me, Galena.
What did you want me to ask Slate again, Galena?
Slate says that the Little Scout just uses hooks to stick onto stuff.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Um...</size>
<size=20>I wanted to ask you about the Little Scout...</size>
<size=20>When Feldspar was still here, they'd let Tephra and I play with their Little Scout.</size>
<size=20>We'd shoot it onto walls and all over the ceiling and take cool photos with it all day long... It was fun..</size>
<size=20>I always wanted to ask them how the Little Scout sticks onto stuff like that.. But.. I never got to...</size>
<size=20>Tephra says there's a mini gravity crystal in each Little Scout that helps it stick on things - but.. I didn't want to break open Feldspar's Little Scout to find out..</size>
<size=20>So.. Can we use your Little Scout, astronaut? Please? It's just a quick look...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Uhhh, how about we just ask Slate instead??

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>..Um.. About how the Little Scout sticks onto stuff..</size>

<size=20>When Feldspar was still here, they'd let Tephra and I play with their Little Scout. We'd shoot it onto walls and all over the ceiling and take cool photos with it all day long... It was fun..</size>
<size=20>I always wanted to ask them how the Little Scout sticks onto stuff like that.. But.. I never got to...</size>
<size=20>Tephra says there's a mini gravity crystal in each Little Scout that helps it stick on things - but.. I didn't want to break open Feldspar's Little Scout to find out..</size>
<size=20>Tephra told me there's a mini gravity crystal in each Little Scout that helps it stick on things - but.. I didn't want to break open Feldspar's Little Scout to find out..</size>
<size=20>So.. Can we use your Little Scout, astronaut? Please?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Uhhh, why don't we check with Slate first, on second thoughts??

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>..Um.. I'm scared to talk to Slate..</size>
<size=20>Could you.. help me ask them, astronaut?</size>
<size=20>Really..? Thank you, astronaut..!</size>
<size=20>Oh.. There's no gravity crystals in there...</size>
<size=20>..I'll never trust Tephra again.....</size>
<size=20>Um, I think I broke the Little Scout, astronaut.. I'm so sorry..</size>
<size=20>But I'm so happy you let me look! Thank you, astronaut..</size>
<size=20>Oh.. So it just uses hooks...</size>
<size=20>..I'll never trust Tephra again.....</size>
<size=20>Thank you for telling me, astronaut. Take care in space!</size>
